meaningMnemonic:
The <kanji>emperor</kanji>'s <kanji>room</kanji> is where the <vocabulary>Imperial Family</vocabulary> gathers.

Note that 皇室 refers to the <vocabulary>Imperial Household</vocabulary> as a family unit, rather than a physical space.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
